sense.gloss: Ise (former province located in the major part of present-day Mie Prefecture and parts of Aichi and Gifu prefectures)
Izu (former province located on the Izu Peninsula in present-day Shizuoka Prefecture, and the Izu Islands)
affectation, showing off, putting on an air, appearances, doing something just for show
Iga (former province located in the west of present-day Mie Prefecture)
Iyo (former province located in present-day Ehime Prefecture)
Kii (former province located in present-day Wakayama and southern Mie prefectures)

sdata.j: ↑急↑↓いそ↓がなくちゃだめだよ。↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓↑先生↑↓せんせい↓が↑出席↑↓しゅっせき↓をとるよ。
sdata.e: We've got to hurry. Mr Itoh will call the roll.

sdata.j: ↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は↑生徒↑↓せいと↓↑達↑↓たち↓を↑一生懸命↑↓いっしょうけんめい↓↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓させた。
sdata.e: Miss Ito made her students work hard.

sdata.j: ↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓↑太郎↑↓たろう↓は↑有罪↑↓ゆうざい↓と↑判決↑↓はんけつ↓された。
↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は、↑歴史↑↓れきし↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えていますか。
↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は、↑歴史↑↓れきし↓を↑教↑↓おし↓えています。
↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓↑先生↑↓せんせい↓が↑出席↑↓しゅっせき↓をとるよ。
sdata.e: Mr Ito will call the roll.

sdata.j: ↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓↑氏↑↓し↓は↑事務所↑↓じむしょ↓で↑熱↑↓あつ↓く↑感↑↓かん↓じたのでネクタイを↑緩↑↓ゆる↓めた。
sdata.e: Mr Ito loosened his tie because he felt hot in his office.

sdata.j: ↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓↑氏↑↓し↓といえば、↑息子↑↓むすこ↓さんはどうなりましたか。
sdata.e: Talking of Mr Ito, what has become of his son?

sdata.j: ↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓↑教授↑↓きょうじゅ↓は↑言語↑↓げんご↓↑学↑↓がく↓の↑研究↑↓けんきゅう↓のためアメリカへ↑行↑↓い↓った。
sdata.e: Professor Ito went to the United States for the purpose of studying linguistics.

sdata.j: ↑伊藤↑↓いとう↓さんはたいへん↑学識↑↓がくしき↓のある↑人↑↓ひと↓です。
sdata.e: Mr Ito is a highly educated man.

words.gloss: Ise (former province located in the major part of present-day Mie Prefecture and parts of Aichi and Gifu prefectures)
Izu (former province located on the Izu Peninsula in present-day Shizuoka Prefecture, and the Izu Islands)
